comments.description: Asynchronously get a cached add-on by id. The add-on (or null if the add-on is not found) is passed to the specified callback. If caching is disabled, null is passed to the specified callback. The callback variant exists only for existing code in XPIProvider.jsm and XPIDatabase.jsm that requires a synchronous callback, yuck.

tags.name: aId
tags.description: The id of the add-on to get

source.source: * @param  aId
*         The id of the add-on to get

tokens.description: The id of the add-on to get

comments.description: Fetch data from an API where the results may span multiple "pages". This function will take care of issuing multiple requests until all the results have been fetched, and will coalesce them all into a single return value.  The handling here is specific to the way AMO implements paging (ie a JSON result with a "next" property).

tags.description: The pref name that contains the API URL to call.

source.source: * @param {string} pref
*                 The pref name that contains the API URL to call.

tokens.description: The pref name that contains the API URL to call.

tags.description: A key-value object that contains the parameters to replace in the API URL.

tokens.description: A key-value object that contains the parameters to replace

source.source: *                 in the API URL.

tokens.description: in the API URL.
